channel.title: Hardware pinout
channel.description:
hi there ! i am looking for some clear explanation of all and every one the connection on the axoloti n one single picture
i've only found info about the main I/O at the edge of the PCB (gpio, etc) but i still wonder what means the RST STR STR beside the stereo outputs and inputs and the 5pin connector at the left of the audio connectors and the 7pin connector beside the usb host connector
i find the documentation of the whole axoloti project quite hard to read because it almost seem to depend on what users asks and respond… is there any well structured documentation somewhere ?
thanks

item.title: Hardware pinout
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Sorry documentation is a bit spread out, I hoped it would have sublimated more from the forum. I'm adding some answers to your questions here. This is a wiki post, so forum users can edit (after gaining some credentials on the forum to prevent spambots).

Read full topic
